title: Dropbox Sync issue - Path not under root.
body:
> What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)

rclone v1.35 & rclone v1.35-129-g980cd5bβ

> Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Windows 10 64 bit.

> Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

Dropbox and ACD.

> The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone sync -c -vv --checkers=15 --transfers=15 dropbox: secret:Dropbox/`

> A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
 
    2017/02/21 20:44:15 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.35-129-g980cd5bβ" starting with parameters ["rclone" "sync" "-c" "-vv" "--checkers=15" "--transfers=15" "dropbox:" "secret:Dropbox/"]
    2017/02/21 20:44:17 INFO  : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Modify window not supported
    2017/02/21 20:44:17 DEBUG : amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Reading ""
    2017/02/21 20:44:17 DEBUG : amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Finished reading ""
    2017/02/21 20:44:18 INFO  : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Waiting for checks to finish
    2017/02/21 20:44:18 INFO  : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Waiting for transfers to finish
    2017/02/21 20:44:18 ERROR : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': not deleting files as there were IO errors
    2017/02/21 20:44:18 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 0 errors and: error reading source directory "Important": path "/Important/Test.txt" is not under root "/Important/"
    2017/02/21 20:44:18 DEBUG : amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Reading ""
    2017/02/21 20:44:18 DEBUG : amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Finished reading ""
    2017/02/21 20:44:19 INFO  : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Waiting for checks to finish
    2017/02/21 20:44:19 INFO  : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Waiting for transfers to finish
    2017/02/21 20:44:19 ERROR : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': not deleting files as there were IO errors
    2017/02/21 20:44:19 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 0 errors and: error reading source directory "BackUps": path "/BackUps/Android Backups" is not under root "/BackUps/"
    2017/02/21 20:44:19 DEBUG : amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Reading ""
    2017/02/21 20:44:20 DEBUG : amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Finished reading ""
    2017/02/21 20:44:20 INFO  : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Waiting for checks to finish
    2017/02/21 20:44:20 INFO  : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Waiting for transfers to finish
    2017/02/21 20:44:20 ERROR : Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': not deleting files as there were IO errors
    2017/02/21 20:44:20 ERROR : Attempt 3/3 failed with 0 errors and: error reading source directory "Photos": path "/Photos/4K" is not under root "/Photos/"
    2017/02/21 20:44:20 Failed to sync: error reading source directory "Photos": path "/Photos/4K" is not under root "/Photos/"

When I run the exact same command in rclone v1.35 (With -v not -vv), it's fine.

    2017/02/21 20:49:17 rclone: Version "v1.35" starting with parameters ["rclone.exe" "sync" "-c" "-v" "--checkers=15" "--transfers=15" "dropbox:" "secret:Dropbox/"]
    2017/02/21 20:49:18 Encrypted amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Modify window not supported
    2017/02/21 20:49:18 amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Reading ""
    2017/02/21 20:49:18 amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Finished reading ""
    2017/02/21 20:49:18 amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Reading "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx/"
    2017/02/21 20:49:18 amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Finished reading "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx/"
    2017/02/21 20:49:18 amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Reading "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx/xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx/"
    2017/02/21 20:49:18 amazon drive root 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx': Finished reading "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx/xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx/"
    2017/02/21 20:49:20 Dropbox root '': 1748 delta entries received
    2017/02/21 20:49:23 Photos/Backgrounds/1920x1080.jpg: Copied (new)

It carries on fine from here to perform the sync.

Not sure what changes have occurred between these two versions, but looks like its altered something?
